game.name: PiyoWars
game.shortDescription: Lead your Piyo army and repel wolves! PiyoWars is a 2.5D action strategy game. Hatch 5 Piyo types and grow your flock by carrying eggs to the nest. Overwhelm foes with numbers and strategy as your Piyo respond to your lead. these diverse, dependable companions are the strength you need!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead your Piyo army and repel wolves! PiyoWars is a 2.5D action strategy game. Hatch 5 Piyo types and grow your flock by carrying eggs to the nest. Overwhelm foes with numbers and strategy as your Piyo respond to your lead. these diverse, dependable companions are the strength you need!
